title: How to level up in boards?
body: Seriously I have no clue. I want to use the boards but I can't... Help meh! >.< Oh uh... Help me, please...

replies.body: I mean or mot I fixed after I posted this.l. So uh... Never mind?

Your Boards profile doesn't sync with your in-game profile until you post or upvote / downvote a post. Now that you're all synced, have fun posting!

(Credits to Porocles for enlightening me on the upvote / downvote)
Woohoo!  Your thread here has updated your boards profile, so you should be able to participate in other areas of the boards now.  Happy posting!
